reviews.text: i need to share about my excellent experience at OJO. i went with the intention of buying contact lens, but i had such a difficult time putting on the lens. i was only able to with Lily’s help — Lily patiently told me what i could do to put it on better, she watched me though i took so so long, she kept encouraging me to try again. had it not been for Lily’s guidance and patience, i would have seriously given up on contact lens. thank you so much Lily, really appreciate it.

My wife and I recently had the pleasure of visiting OJO and were fortunate to be served by Jason, and I must say, his service exceeded our expectations. Right from the moment we stepped into the clinic, we were welcomed with genuine warmth and utmost professionalism by the friendly staff. Jason's expertise and meticulous approach were evident throughout the entire examination process. He took the time to carefully explain the results, ensuring we fully understood them, and patiently recommended me spectacle models that were suitable for me and my wife’s face shape. We wholeheartedly recommend Jason from OJO to anyone seeking a highly knowledgeable and compassionate optometrist.

Stumbled upon OJO optometry and was attended to by Jason. Bought my contact lenses and Jason very kindly shared with me samples of products I was interested in (coloured contacts, lens solution etc). Knowing that I was also uncertain about trying a new range of coloured contacts, Jason offered a pair of dailys before committing to a purchase. Thank you for the dedicated service & thoughtfulness! The team gifted an umbrella too.

Honestly recommend Jason and team for anyone looking for good service and product range!

My spectacle broke and needed one urgently. Pass by this shop and was trying luck to see if they are able to do my spectacle on the spot. To my surprise they was very diligence in helping me. The whole process from finding a spectacle to my liking, eye check, payment and getting my spectacle was fast. They took about 10-15minute time to do my spectacle. I am grateful that I pass by this shop and decided to give it a try. And they were all very friendly. Special shoutout to Amirah, as she was really nice and patient while doing all the eye check for me. I would highly recommend this place!

Love the service by all the staffs! All of them are very willing to help and aided me in choosing the best frame and lens for me. They have a wide variety of frames too. Will highly reccomend the service here! 10/10 satisfied with my experience
